updates.title: [Enhancement]: Get to know how doctor is used
[Enhancement]: Add a delay in the retry mechanism
[Enhancement]: Table of contents shortcode added
[Enhancement]: Added `skipPages`, `skipNavigation`, and `skipSiteDesign` flags
[Enhancement]: Autocomplete functionality added for commands and its arguments
[Enhancement]: Easier debugging with ability to attach the VSCode debugger
[Enhancement]: Ability to specify to clean the `QuickLaunch` and/or `TopNavigation`
[Enhancement]: Post clean-up of removed/untouched pages
Documentation site created [getdoctor.io](https://getdoctor.io).
Enhancement to allow Doctor to generate the HTML instead of the Markdown Web Part.
Fix for skipping pages.
Enhancement making skipping pages faster without the need to check each page.
Enhancements to make it possible to change the look and feel of the site.
Enhancements to set the code editor theme for Markdown.
Enhancements to minify the CSS provided to the Markdown web part.
Enhancements to set the site its logo.
Fix for only retrieving the page its metadata so that encoding of the page its content would not lead to issues.
Enhancement to specify to retry the command execution if it failed.
Added metadata support for pages.
Add support for certificate authentication (provided by [Gustavo Covas](https://github.com/gustavocovas)).
Enhancement: Be able to specify which version of CLI for Microsoft 365 you want to use.
Fix for issue with encoding `<` and `>` in the markdown.
Enhancement: Masking the password and certificate Base64 string in the console.
Enhancement: Debug configuration for `vscode` added to the project.
Page template support added.
Enhancement: Added `--skipExistingPages` support.
Fix issue with encoding special characters.
Enhancement: Added `--continueOnError` support.
Fix for navigation command execution.
Fix issue with multiple images on pages.
Fix issue with 2nd level navigation items.
Enhancement: Add support for page description.
Enhancement: Support for setting header image of the page.
Enhancement: Add support for title area layout.
Make `draft` optional.
Include folder name for slug when not set in front matter.
Add support in Front Matter to enable or disable page comments. By default they are disabled.
Added MIT license to the project.
Fix for `cleanStart` when comfirm flag is not provided. Thanks to [Mark Heptinstall](https://github.com/mheptinstall).
Added parameter to clean up all pages and assets before publishing.
Added support for specifying the `layoutType` from within the front matter.
Implemented easier command execution from within the tool.
Enhanced the test actions with screenshots.
Added process exit codes to make sure it correctly outputs a success or failure status.
Fix for specified webPartData is not a valid JSON string.
Removed the `jq` dependency with a fallback to JSON parsing in the tool itself.
Unknown arguments do not blow up the command execution + `--help` added to the main command.
Added cross-platform support.
Cross-platform builds and publishing setup on GitHub Actions.
Updated the CLI for Microsoft 365 to 3.4.0 as this has huge performance improvements
Added support for linking pages in Markdown.
Added `outputFolder` argument which when provided, will ouput the processed Markdown files with updated image and page links.
Fix for when `m365` tool is not globally available
Initial release
